title: Wack A Bot
body:
Hi All, no clue on forum rules but decided to post this since it's a fun thing to do with the game. 

Get 5 friends
Game length : 10-15 mins
Go to Co-Op vs AI select Intro

All go mid lane and destroy. Once the Bot's spawn they will join you there and you should have fun we tend to go first Penta or most kills wins. 
We have done a few changes also. It's not meant to be a serious game since it's vs intro bot. It's just plain fun. 

If you have just had a tilt game or need a break just try it.

replies.body:
Since you mentioned not really knowing where topics should go, I felt pretty bad simply removing this one. Keep in mind these kinds of posts would be best over in Gameplay or General Discussion since Help & Support is primarily used for troubleshooting the game or client when issues happen.

This * does* kinda sound like fun tbh xD! Please keep in mind that co-op games should usually be played like normal games, so be sure to keep this kind of gameplay only between friends in something like custom games possibly.
